oracle.mapviewer.share.style
Class TruetypeFont

java.lang.Object
  oracle.mapviewer.share.style.TruetypeFont
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TruetypeFont
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Represents the data model for a MapViewer Truetype font TTF style.

See Also:

setFontData

public void setFontData(byte[] fontData)
Sets the binary contents of the font (from its original font file). Note this update will not recreate the Java Font object. If needed, call the refreshFont method to recriate the Font object.

Parameters:
fontData - - binary contents of the font

getFontData

public byte[] getFontData()
Returns the binary contents of the font.

Returns:
byte[] - array with the binary contents of the font

refreshFont

public void refreshFont()
                 throws java.lang.Exception
Causes the font object to be recreated from the font data. If the font data is null, this method does nothing.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception
